dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: I am Metatron, the Shedu Sentinel, guardian of the Sanctum of Despair. What business do you have here, intruder?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to challenge your authority and claim the Heart of Light for myself.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your arrogance is matched only by your foolishness. You will not leave this place unscathed.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will crush any who stand in my way, including you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You overestimate your power, dark one. Prepare to face the consequences of your actions.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Enough talk, let our blades speak for us!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. In battle, the truth shall be revealed.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense your hesitation, do you dare face me in combat?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hesitation? You mistake caution for weakness. Your end draws near.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am willing to negotiate. Let us talk peacefully and reach a mutual agreement.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Negotiate? There is no room for compromise with one who seeks to disrupt the balance of this realm.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer you a share of the power from the Heart of Light if you stand down.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: The power of light holds no allure for me. Your offer is futile.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Is there no way we can coexist in this domain, finding common ground?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Our paths diverge too greatly for harmony. This confrontation is inevitable.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see the strength in you, perhaps we could join forces and rule together.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Rule together? You must be deluded to think I would ever ally myself with darkness.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your refusal only strengthens my resolve. Prepare for battle!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Resolve alone cannot overcome the light, prepare to face your downfall.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I understand your stance. Let's settle this through combat then.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: As you wish. The shadows shall yield to the light's unfaltering radiance.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no quarrel with you, I seek an audience with Aurelius the Undying.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Audience with Aurelius? Few are granted such a privilege. State your purpose clearly.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I wish to discuss a truce between our factions. The darkness threatens us all.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Truce? The darkness within you cannot be denied. Our factions will never find common ground.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come bearing a warning of a greater threat looming over the Darkened Spires.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A greater threat, you say? Your words hold no weight in the presence of the light's clarity.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I understand the gravity of this realm. I will depart peacefully if you allow it.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Depart? Your presence here is a stain on the sanctity of this place. Leave or face the consequences.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am but a lost wanderer seeking guidance in these dark lands.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Lost wanderer, your aura betrays your true intentions. Speak the truth of your purpose.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: My purpose is simply to find my path and learn from those more experienced.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Learning from experience may prove deadly in these lands. Ignorance is not absolution.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek knowledge of the Heart of Light, hoping to understand its significance.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge is a double-edged sword, wield it unwisely and you may find yourself cut.
